ml.tree
Class TreeNode

java.lang.Object
  ml.tree.TreeNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
InternalNode, LeafNode
public abstract class TreeNode
extends java.lang.Object

A tree node of a tree

Author:
Ping He, Xiaohua Xu

getTrainError

public abstract float getTrainError()
Get the train error of the tree node

Returns:
If there is no missing data distributed on the tree node, the train error should be an integer;
Otherwise, the train error should be an estimated float value computed by some statistical method.
See Also:
LeafNode.getTrainError(), InternalNode.getTrainError()

setTrainError

public abstract void setTrainError(float error)
Set the train error of the tree node

See Also:
LeafNode.setTrainError(float error), InternalNode.setTrainError(float error)
